full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Project Title
Quay Wall Project - St. Andrews Lock & Dam

## Tender Project Information
### Project Reference Number
WS3989976510 - Doc3999718960
### Amendment Number
6
### Solicitation Number
WS3989976510
### Publication Date
May 11, 2023
### Tender Closing Date
July 14, 2023, 2:00pm EDT
### Amendment Date
June 22, 2023

## Tender Project Scope
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking the services of a civil engineering firm (consultant) as the prime consultant with a multi-disciplinary team of sub-consultants experienced in design and construction of retaining walls in a marine environment. The project involves the evaluation of options to stabilize (repair, replace, or remove) the Quay Wall at St. Andrews Lock & Dam located in Lockport, Manitoba. The successful contractor will be required to provide investigation, analysis, and recommendations as per the Terms of Reference.

## Contract Details
### Expected Contract Start Date
August 1, 2023
### Expected Contract End Date
July 31, 2024
### Regions of Delivery
Manitoba
### Regions of Opportunity
None
### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Contract Contact
For more information, please contact:
Fagan, Mike (SPAC/PSPC)
mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Documents
Please refer to the tender notice posted on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys for additional information.
